            Act and such awards shall, subject to this section and
            section 4, be computed and made on the following basis, that

Service Commission or the Public Service Commission, as
the case may be, under subsection (3) the Governor-
General may, in his discretion, once refer that recommenda-

and if that Commission, having reconsidered its original
recommendation, substitutes therefor a different recommen-
dation, this subsection shall apply to that different recom-
mendation as it applies to the original recommendation.

provisions.title: Section 4
provisions.content:
4.-(1) In effecting an award regard shall be had to the power to
relevant regulations subject to such modifications as the           r$zions
Governor-General, acting on the advice of the Public Service
Commission, may notify by publication in the Gazette so, laws.
however, that any such modifications which are less favour-
able to a scheduled transferee than the relevant regulations
shall, to the extent to which they are less favourable, not
apply to that scheduled transferee or to any award made to
or in respect of that scheduled transferee.
         (2) For the purposes of this section in so far as any
provision applicable to or in respect of an award to or in
respect of a scheduled transferee depends on the option of
the person to or in respect of whom the award is granted or
to be granted, the provision for which he opts shall be taken
to be more favourable to him than any other provision for
which he might have opted.
